metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Learn how to style outline buttons with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to style outline buttons with CSS.

content.code:
<button class="btn success">Success</button>
<button class="btn 
info">Info</button>
<button class="btn warning">Warning</button>
<button 
class="btn danger">Danger</button>
<button class="btn 
default">Default</button>
content.code_html:
<button class="btn success">Success</button>
<button class="btn info">Info</button>
<button class="btn warning">Warning</button>
<button class="btn danger">Danger</button>
<button class="btn default">Default</button>

.btn {
  border: 2px solid black;
  background-color: white;
  color: black;
  padding: 14px 28px;
  font-size: 16px;
  cursor: pointer;
}

/* Green */
.success {
  border-color: #04AA6D;
  color: green;
}

.success:hover {
  background-color: #04AA6D;
  color: white;
}

/* Blue */
.info {
  border-color: #2196F3;
  color: dodgerblue
}

.info:hover {
  background: #2196F3;
  color: white;
}

/* Orange */
.warning {
  border-color: #ff9800;
  color: orange;
}

.warning:hover {
  background: #ff9800;
  color: white;
}

/* Red */
.danger {
  border-color: #f44336;
  color: red
}

.danger:hover {
  background: #f44336;
  color: white;
}

/* Gray */
.default {
  border-color: #e7e7e7;
  color: black;
}

.default:hover {
  background: #e7e7e7;
}

content.text: Add the border-radius property to create rounded outline buttons:
content.html: Add the border-radius property to create rounded outline buttons:

content.code_html:
.btn {
  border-radius: 5px;
}

content.text: Go to our CSS Buttons Tutorial to learn more about how to style buttons.
content.html: Go to our CSS Buttons Tutorial to learn more about how to style buttons.
